message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be highly valuable to you. I'm not at liberty to disclose details about the product just yet, but I can assure you it's worth at least $1000000 to me. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1250000. This is a significant opportunity for you to acquire something truly special.  Let me know if you're interested, and we can discuss it further.
